column2:
# scan epistasis
episcan(geno1 = geno1,
        geno2 = geno2,
        pheno = p, 
        phetype = "quantitative",
        outfile = "episcan_2geno_quant", 
        suffix = ".txt", 
        zpthres = 0.6, 
        chunksize = 50, 
        scale = TRUE)
p-value threshold of Z test for output: 0.6
